feature.name: Gunlance Proficiency
feature.text: You are proficient with the Gunlance, a unique martial weapon with explosive capabilities. It uses shells to deal extra damage.

feature.name: Shell Gauge
feature.text: You gain a gauge with explosive charges used to fuel abilities. Regain all charges after a long rest.

feature.name: Wyvern's Fire
feature.text: Unleash a powerful blast: 4d10 fire damage in a 30-foot line. DEX save for half. Usable once per long rest.

feature.name: Artillery Style
feature.text: Choose a shelling style: Normal (balanced), Long (range-focused), or Wide (AoE-focused).

feature.name: Advanced Shelling
feature.text: Your Gunlance now deals an extra die of damage when using explosive features.
